properties.entry: INSERT INTO NOTICE (KEY, N_TITLE, N_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_NNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?)
SELECT KEY, N_TITLE, N_CONTENT, COUNT, CREATEDATE FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATEDATE DESC
UPDATE NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE KEY = ?
SELECT KEY, N_TITLE, N_CONTENT, CREATEDATE FROM NOTICE WHERE KEY = ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET N_TITLE = ?, N_CONTENT = ? WHERE KEY = ?
